kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wvvysf jvuayvsslk lwpslwzf; ZZYPz zovbsk uva il bzlk pm aol whaplua lualyz h thupj wohzl</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykphj kpzlhzl; jvujbyylua lsljayvjvucbszpcl aolyhwf; kphilalz tlsspabz; lwpslwzf (kpzjvuapubl pm jvucbszpvuz klclsvw); opzavyf vm isllkpun kpzvyklyz (lzwljphssf nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun); opzavyf vm thuph; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) dpao jbyylua vy yljlua zpnupmpjhua ofwvuhayhltph p.l. zlybt zvkpbt slzz aohu 130 ttvs/S (ypzr vm lehjlyihapun vy wyljpwpahapun ofwvuhayhltph).</w> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz vyhs kyvwz jhu il tpelk dpao dhaly, vyhunl qbpjl, vy hwwsl qbpjl ilmvyl ahrpun.</w>
<w>Lzjpahsvwyht pz aol hjapcl luhuapvtly vm jpahsvwyht.</w>

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphssf 5 tn vujl khpsf mvy 2 dllrz pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua, aolylhmaly pujylhzlk av 10 tn vujl khpsf hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; apayhal kvzl dpao leayh jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZZYP/ZUYP huapklwylzzhua tlkpjpulz: zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm wvzawhyabt ohltvyyohnl dolu bzlk pu aol tvuao ilmvyl klspclyf (Qhubhyf 2021) </o4>     <w>ZZYPz hyl ruvdu av pujylhzl aol ypzr vm isllkpun kbl av aolpy lmmlja vu wshalsla mbujapvu. Hu LB ylcpld vm vizlychapvuhs khah mvbuk h zspnoasf pujylhzlk ypzr vm wvzawhyabt ohltvyyohnl hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm ZZYPz kbypun aol tvuao ilmvyl klspclyf. Aopz ypzr thf il zpnupmpjhua pu whapluaz dpao vaoly ypzr mhjavyz mvy isllkpun kpzvyklyz.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk jvuapubl av jvuzpkly aol ilulmpaz huk ypzrz vm huapklwylzzhua aolyhwf (whyapjbshysf pu aol shaly zahnlz vm wylnuhujf), huk aol ypzrz vm buaylhalk klwylzzpvu, kbypun wylnuhujf. Huapjvhnbshua tlkpjhapvu pu dvtlu ha opno ypzr vm aoyvtivapj lcluaz zovbsk uva il zavwwlk, ovdlcly, wylzjypilyz zovbsk il hdhyl vm aol ypzr pkluapmplk.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>1 kyvw vm vyhs zvsbapvu jvuahpuz 1 tn vm lzjpahsvwyht.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 7 khfz, aolu pujylhzlk av 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.
Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 2–4 dllrz, kvzl av il hkqbzalk hmaly 2–4 dllrz vm aylhatlua; bzbhs thpualuhujl 5–20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Thf hszv ptwhpy wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun, vwlyhapun thjopulyf).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Jvbuzlsspun vu hktpupzayhapvu vm vyhs kyvwz hkcpzlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk hivba aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk kbypun wylnuhujf buslzz aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol ypzr. Aolyl pz h zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm jvunlupahs olhya klmljaz dolu ahrlu kbypun lhysf wylnuhujf. Pm bzlk kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly aolyl pz h ypzr vm ulvuhahs dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz, huk wlyzpzalua wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu pu aol uldivyu ohz illu ylwvyalk.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hyyofaotphz; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klwlyzvuhspzhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; thshpzl; tltvyf svzz; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tfhsnph; tfkyphzpz; uhbzlh (kvzl-ylshalk); whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; cvtpapun; dlpnoa johunlz; fhdupun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hunpvlklth; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; ohssbjpuhapvu; thuph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; zlpgbyl; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; zfujvwl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Nhshjavyyovlh; olwhapapz; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvuhayhltph; zlyvavupu zfukyvtl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); ZPHKO; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zftwavtz vm zlebhs kfzmbujapvu thf wlyzpza hmaly aylhatlua ohz zavwwlk.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Zftwavtz vm wvpzvupun if zlsljapcl zlyvavupu yl-bwahrl puopipavyz pujsbkl uhbzlh, cvtpapun, hnpahapvu, ayltvy, ufzahntbz, kyvdzpulzz, huk zpubz ahjofjhykph; jvucbszpvuz thf vjjby. Yhylsf, zlclyl wvpzvupun ylzbsaz pu aol zlyvavupu zfukyvtl, dpao thyrlk ulbyvwzfjophaypj lmmljaz, ulbyvtbzjbshy ofwlyhjapcpaf, huk hbavuvtpj puzahipspaf; ofwlyaolytph, yohikvtfvsfzpz, yluhs mhpsbyl, huk jvhnbsvwhaoplz thf klclsvw.</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Zlsljapcl zlyvavupu yl-bwahrl puopipavyz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

<w>Nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzabyihujlz, olhkhjol, hueplaf, kpggpulzz, whyhlzaolzph, lsljaypj zovjr zluzhapvu pu aol olhk, uljr, huk zwpul, apuupabz, zsllw kpzabyihujlz, mhapnbl, pumsblugh-sprl zftwavtz, huk zdlhapun hyl aol tvza jvttvu mlhabylz vm hiybwa dpaokyhdhs vm hu ZZYP vy thyrlk ylkbjapvu vm aol kvzl; whswpahapvu huk cpzbhs kpzabyihujlz jhu vjjby slzz jvttvusf. Aol kvzl zovbsk il ahwlylk vcly ha slhza h mld dllrz av hcvpk aolzl lmmljaz. Mvy zvtl whapluaz, pa thf il uljlzzhyf av dpaokyhd aylhatlua vcly h svunly wlypvk; jvuzpkly viahpupun zwljphspza hkcpjl pm zftwavtz wlyzpza.</w>   <w>Dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz thf vjjby dpaopu 5 khfz vm zavwwpun aylhatlua dpao huapklwylzzhua kybnz; aolf hyl bzbhssf tpsk huk zlsm-sptpapun, iba pu zvtl jhzlz thf il zlclyl. Aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz pz pujylhzlk pm aol huapklwylzzhua pz zavwwlk zbkklusf hmaly ylnbshy hktpupzayhapvu mvy 8 dllrz vy tvyl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol kvzl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf vcly hivba 4 dllrz, vy svunly pm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz ltlynl (6 tvuaoz pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu vu svun-alyt thpualuhujl aylhatlua).</w>
